Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLBlockExecutor

All Superinterfaces:
JooqDSLProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
Jooqx, JooqxBase<S>, JooqxConn, JooqxSession, JooqxTx, LegacyInternal<S>, LegacyJooqx, LegacyJooqxSession, LegacyJooqxTx, SQLExecutor<S,B,PQ,RC>
@Unstable @Experimental public interface SQLBlockExecutor extends JooqDSLProvider
Represents for a Block executor that executes SQL statements
Since:
2.0.0
